de.wwu.muggl.ui.gui
Class SWTGui

java.lang.Object
  de.wwu.muggl.ui.gui.SWTGui

public class SWTGui
extends java.lang.Object

The main window of the application, responsible for loading any other GUI elements. It is started in an own Thread.

Version:
1.0.0, 2010-08-18
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

loadRecentlyOpenedFileMenu

public void loadRecentlyOpenedFileMenu()
The methods loads the entries for the recently loaded files. It then removes any entries from the corresponding menu and adds the entries it loaded.
